text: Francisco H.L. Ou (; 5 January 1940 â€“ 30 October 2021) was a Taiwanese politician. He was born in Hsinchu, Taiwan, Empire of Japan. He was the Minister of Foreign Affairs between 2008 until 2009 during the Ma Ying-jeou presidency. He was also an ambassador to Guatemala and Nicaragua. Ou died on 30 October 2021 from pneumonia, aged 81.Taiwan's ex-Foreign Minister Francisco Ou passes away at age 81 ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Ambassadors of Taiwan Category:Taiwanese politicians
title: Francisco Ou
